Name: Bottle in the Form of a Lady with Long Hair
Description: The bottle is in the shape of a woman. Both her hands are on her belly and her breasts hang down. She stands on the tips of her toes on the ground. She has long hair with locks that reach her hips. A handle starts at the back of her head and goes all the way down her back. The short neck of the bottle with its wide lip is above her head. The colors have disappeared.
